endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Select the API endpoint to extract

date_from.title: Date From
date_from.description: Start date for extraction. Supported formats: 'today', 'yesterday', '5 hours ago', '3 days ago', '4 months ago', '2 years ago'. Used as filter for tickets, contacts, and activities endpoints.

date_to.title: Date To
date_to.description: End date for extraction. Supported formats: 'today', 'yesterday', '5 hours ago', '3 days ago', '4 months ago', '2 years ago'. Used as filter for tickets, contacts, and activities endpoints.

async.label: Discover Available Fields
async.description: Click to discover all available fields for this endpoint. The result will help you fill in the 'Fields to Extract' below.

fields.title: Fields to Extract
fields.description: Specify which fields to extract for this endpoint (leave empty to extract all fields). You can type field names manually or use the 'Discover Available Fields' button above.
